4 Developer Wisdom

Martin Fowler

Steve Jobs
"The most important property of a program is whether it accomplishes the intention of its user."
C.A.R. Hoare

4 Code Snippets

Save useful code patterns, solutions, and resources for future reference.

Debounce Function

JavaScript 
function debounce(func, wait) {
  let timeout;
  return function(...args) {
    clearTimeout(timeout);
    timeout = setTimeout(() => {
      func.apply(this, args);
    }, wait);
  };
}

"Build to learn. Code to grow. Ship to validate. Iterate to improve."
